name: Touhou Puppet Dance Performance: Shard of Dreams - Extended
summary:
Touhou Puppet Dance Performance: Shard of Dreams -Extended- is a mod adds 25 new Puppets to the base Shard of Dreams expansion. Every new character from Touhou 15.5, 16, 17, 17.5, 18 and Lotus Eaters has been added, with the game being rebalanced and the campaign being tweaked to make these additions seamless.

This mod also features new areas, costumes, music tracks, moves, abilities and items rounding out the changes.
